ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'No, but this is what we found our fathers doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "No. But we found our fathers doing so."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They answered: "No; but we found our forefathers doing so."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or can they benefit or harm you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “In fact we found our forefathers doing likewise.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "(Nay) but we found our fathers doing so."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Nay, we found our fathers doing so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Nay, but we found our fathers so doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Nay, but we found our fathers acting on this wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "But we found our fathers doing the same."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: nay; but we found our fathers doing in this wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Indeed, we found our fathers doing likewise.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Nay, but we found our fathers doing thus (what we do)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Nay, but we found our fathers doing so."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'No, but we found our fathers doing so'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “But we found our ancestors doing so.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:74] They said, ‘Rather, we found our fathers so doing’, that is, doing the same as we do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Nay, but we found our fathers acting on this use) we found our fathers worshipping these deities, and we have emulated them.
